protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Low-affinity receptor for leukotrienes including leukotriene B4. Mediates chemotaxis of granulocytes and macrophages. The response is mediated via G-proteins that activate a phosphatidylinositol-calcium second messenger system. The rank order of affinities for the leukotrienes is LTB4 > 12-epi-LTB4 > LTB5 > LTB3

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
